item.title: CVE-2024-31923|2024-08-02T01:59:50.673Z -- pluginops -- feather%20login%20page
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PluginOps Feather Login Page.This issue affects Feather Login Page: from n/a through 1.1.5.
